detail_desc: Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a button on one shoulder, long sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a button on one shoulder, long sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle boots in grained imitation leather with a zip in one side and wedge heels. Faux fur linings and insoles, and sturdy fluted soles. Platform front approx. 2.5 cm. Heel approx. 4.5 cm.

Set with a short-sleeved shirt and pair of shorts in a cotton weave. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, a small embroidered motif on the chest and a rounded hem. Knee-length shorts with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake back pocket.

Set with a short-sleeved shirt and pair of shorts in a cotton weave. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, a small embroidered motif on the chest and a rounded hem. Knee-length shorts with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake back pocket.
Crop top in jersey with a low neckline front and back and wide shoulder straps.
Short, fitted top in ribbed jersey.
Cycling shorts in airy, softly draping jersey with an elasticated waist.
Slightly longer, straight-cut, single-breasted jacket in a soft weave with notch lapels, fastening with one sparkly button at the front, and two flap front pockets. Lined.
Court shoes in imitation suede with pointed toes and covered heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Fitted, long-sleeved body in soft cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline, low-cut back and press-studs at the crotch.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a fake fly.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a fake fly.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a fake fly.
Body in ribbed jersey with a square neckline, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.

Lightly padded cardigan and a pair of trousers in soft velour. Cardigan with a hood, wrapover front with concealed press-studs and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Jersey lining.. Trousers with wide, foldover jersey ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the cardigan and trousers is organic.
Jumper in soft, jacquard-knit cotton with a round neckline, long sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ballet pumps with a decorative bow at the front and a strap over the foot. Cotton twill linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Ballet pumps with a decorative bow at the front and a strap over the foot. Cotton twill linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Trainers in leather with suede details, open lacing and a lightly padded edge and tongue. Leather linings and insoles and slightly higher, textured soles.
Leather sandals with metal buckles and a heel strap with a hook and loop fastening at the back. Suede linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Leather sandals with metal buckles and a heel strap with a hook and loop fastening at the back. Suede linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Leather sandals with metal buckles and a heel strap with a hook and loop fastening at the back. Suede linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Playsuit in soft velour with a double-layered drawstring hood, zip at the top and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and diagonal side pockets.
Top for a dog in lightweight, cotton sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, openings for the front legs and a large opening for the back legs.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline and long sleeves with contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline and long sleeves with contrasting colour stripes down the sides.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with concealed press-studs at the top, a jersey-lined hood with a pompom, and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Trousers with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Jumper in soft, cable-knit organic cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Cardigan in soft, rib-knit wool with buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and a hood with a pompom on top.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in soft, garter-stitched organic cotton. Jumper with long raglan sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and roll-edge hems.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Shirt in an organic cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Trousers in double-weave, crinkled organic cotton with an adjustable, elasticated waist and fake fly with a button. Side pockets, a back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Detachable elastic braces with imitation leather details.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Hat in soft, rib-knit wool.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Hat in soft, rib-knit wool.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Mittens in a soft rib-knit wool. Jersey lining.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Mittens in a soft rib-knit wool. Jersey lining.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend. Supplied in a box.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.

Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neckline and gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neckline and gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Short, straight-style T-shirt in soft jersey with ribbing around the neckline and an embroidered motif at the top. The cotton content of the T-shirt is organic.

Vest top in ribbed jersey. Narrow cut at the top with short shoulder straps and a racer back. The cotton content of the top is organic.

Straight-cut, calf-length dress in woven fabric with a grandad collar and covered buttons at the top. Detachable tie belt at the waist, long, slightly wider sleeves, and narrow cuffs with covered buttons. Unlined.
Shorts in an airy, textured weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and an open back pocket.
Shorts in an airy, textured weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and an open back pocket.
Knee-length skirt in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with a high paper bag waist, detachable tie belt, buttons down the front and side pockets with a decorative flap and button. Unlined.
Knee-length skirt in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with a high paper bag waist, detachable tie belt, buttons down the front and side pockets with a decorative flap and button. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated weave with a high, elasticated waist. Lined.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated weave with a high, elasticated waist. Lined.

Dress in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with embroidery. Small opening with a button at the back of the neck, a seam at the top and a flare to the hem. Wide balloon sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs.
Comfort blanket in cotton muslin with a padded head. Size 35x35 cm.
Short jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Short jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

Hi-tops in matt imitation leather with print motifs, a padded shaft and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Adjustable hook and loop tab with a metal D-ring and decorative hanging tab with a text print. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide jumper in a fine knit with a lightly brushed finish. Stand-up collar, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide jumper in a fine knit with a lightly brushed finish. Stand-up collar, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide jumper in a fine knit with a lightly brushed finish. Stand-up collar, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Socks in a soft, rib-knit wool blend.

Bras in jersey made from a cotton blend with lace details and underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Patterned advent calendar with 24 compartments each concealing a pair of earrings, a necklace or a ring.
Nightshirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted top in soft, ribbed jersey with a round neck and short puff sleeves.
Slip-on trainers in cotton canvas with an elastic gore at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Slip-on trainers in cotton canvas with an elastic gore at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Tuxedo trousers in a jacquard-weave cotton blend with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Discreet pockets in the side seams, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
